title: WTB:  Signed T206 (Marquard, Doyle, Snodgrass, etc.)

posts.post_title: WTB:  Signed T206 (Marquard, Doyle, Snodgrass, etc.)
posts.post_content:
If you've got a signed T206, I wanna buy it!  

Email me at [url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url] if you've got any....

Thanks for looking!!

Bump.... Would it help if I offered you $500 for your signed T206 card?

...or if I was willing to trade one or more of my signed T206 dupes to get your signed T206 card?

Send me a scan; ask for the moon -- I dare you!

:D

[url]SignedT206@gmail.com[/url]
